mapper.update: update goods set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, stock = #{stock,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_deleted = #{idDeleted,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, name, price, status, stock, intro, description, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, id_deleted from goods where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, name, price, status, stock, intro, description, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, id_deleted from goods
